Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.14 Upādinnaduka » 10.14.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.14.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 10.14.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejātādi
Mahantaraduka
Upādinnaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejātādi
424.
3393Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (Yāva asaññasattā.) (1)
3394Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  upādinne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)
3395Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  anupādinne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… . (Yāva asaññasattā.) (1)
3396Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  upādinne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ…  napacchājātapaccayā…  naāsevanapaccayā. (1)
